title: Italy : natural gas imports 2018 , by country of origin
yAxis: Natural gas imports in million cubic meters
summary: The Russia industry accounted for a 32321 million Natural of gas Italy imports in 2018 , which amounted to about 2,136 metric tons .
Russia was therefore the largest Italy demanding industry gas .
Golds uses Italy is a transition metal that has bright yellow coloring .
gold: In 2018 , Russia – with 32,321 million cubic meters of natural gas exported to Italy - was the main supplier of this fuel.
In the same year , Italy imported 17,970 million cubic meters of natural gas from Algeria and 6,535 million cubic meters from Qatar.
Overall , the volume of natural gas imported from Russia oscillated throughout the past years , even though it was quite steady from 2014 to 2017 .
